Content: Here is a list of some of the Threads I have written over the last several years on Twitter. I talk about $BTC and $ETH trading as well as a bunch of other topics. I've always used Twitter as a trading journal and am learning as much as you, so I hope you find this helpful. https://t.co/2K8bcXx4sE

Crypto is very much a single player game when you first start. you're alone, just reading/lurking/researching. 

Once you start to gain knowledge and make connections, it becomes more of a network game. 

Make friends quick and you will grow much faster

https://t.co/X9yhMojIvb

Are you sidelined?

Bitter that you are seeing your friends have life changing gains while you sit in cash, waiting for the big $BTC dip?

You have 2 decisions: Continue to let bear market PTSD wreck your conscience 

or actually enter the arena 

the choice is yours https://t.co/oeUb748jvf

I've been here since 2017 and spent thousands of hours in this space.

Here's something I've learned for every year I've been here - as it was fun to do on stream the other day.

Stay a while and listen, friend. https://t.co/emQVn14nwe

The economics of NFTs are broken. 

It could technically make more revenue than all of ETH staking, but is "locked" behind shallow mechanisms. We focus on creating deeper capital markets

We completed our raise to not only fix the economics of NFTs, but also of EVERYTHING üßµ https://t.co/V7bq6yxWR7

New shiny ones like $NTRN are going to do way better than the old ones. 

A few mantras for this cycle:

-Take out the words 'already pumped/too high' from your framing

-New > old

-Go where the liquidity/volatility goes, don't buy old shitcoins from 2019 https://t.co/LcfXz8CUo8
Gm my friends

You will make more money than you think is possible.

You will likely lose most, if not all of it due to greed and your ego.

You are not a genius. The sooner you realize this, the better.‚Ä¶

$BTC: I think you really want to see this area hold. A single retest is fine on the former range high; you don't want to see high time frame closes below, though.

Having strong follow up is very important for continuation of the breakout. Otherwise it's just a range deviation https://t.co/wSBbrbzMQz

There are a billion things that you need to think about when entering a position but 1 of the most important is time duration

How long am I holding this for?

If you're bullish $BTC & crypto, prices are likely to be MUCH higher 6+ months from now.

Ask yourself if you're taking‚Ä¶ https://t.co/xFQtBIcoET

There are several coins that had long accumulations and the same type of pattern:
1) big strong move up
2) chop/consolidation for weeks
3) next move up

You want to find coins that have some semblance of narrative/fundamentals. $LINK $SUPER $BEAM

These types of coins oftentimes‚Ä¶ https://t.co/l8IWt3YNqt
